title: City Council 7/5/2
description:

Agenda: Call to Order, Roll Call, Presentations; Public Comment; Adoption of Introduction and Referral Calendar, Approval of Consent Calendar, Approval of the Agenda; Reconsideration of Council Bill Vetoed by Mayor: CB 120325: relating to housing and displacement mitigation; CF 314495: Report of the City Clerk on the Certificate of Sufficiency for Initiative No. 134; CB 120357: relating to City employment - International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers Local Union No. 77; CB 120354: relating to Seattle Public Utilities - amended Water Quality Combined Financial Assistance Agreement; Items removed from consent calendar; adoption of other resolutions; other business; Executive Session.
